snippet: Several acquisitions and transactions have already been made this week, coming on the heels of others that took place last week. The deals are predominantly in the faster-growing specialty areas of the business like shopper marketing, digital...
abstract: Several acquisitions and transactions have already been made this week, coming on the heels of others that took place last week. The deals are predominantly in the faster-growing specialty areas of the business like shopper marketing, digital advertising and public relations.

headline.main: New Year Begins With Flurry of Ad Industry Deals
